newsitem.title: USA: GFSB plans to buy back another 15 pct.
newsitem.headline: GFSB plans to buy back another 15 pct.

text.p: GFSB Bancorp Inc said Tuesday that it intends to buy back another 15 percent of its common stock.
The amount equals 142,312 of its 948,750 original shares, the company said.

The repurchases require a waiver of a 5 percent repurchase limit, the company said, adding that there is no assurance it waiver application will be approved or that the full 15 percent will be repurchased.
The company said Tuesday it has already completed the repurchase of 5 percent of its common stock, or 47,437 shares.
It said the additional repurchases would be made in the open market and be completed by June 28.
